ROOT:
-- DaoT_WorkflowHistory_S2_Select -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 SELECT [WorkflowControlNo], [HistoryNo], [WfPositionId], [WorkflowNo], [FromUserId], [FromUserInfo], [ActionType], [ToUserId], [ToUserInfo], [ToUserPositionTitlesId], [NextWfPositionId], [NextWorkflowNo], [ReserveArea], [ReplyDeadline], [StartDate], [AcceptanceDate], [AcceptanceUserId], [AcceptanceUserInfo], [EndDate] FROM [T_WorkflowHistory]
WHERE [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNo AND [HistoryNo] = @HistoryNo
